instructions.title: How to Use the Unit Price Calculator App
instructions.description: This app helps calculate the unit price of a product by comparing the quantity received with the money spent, making it easier to choose the best deal.

step_1.title: Enter Product Details for Comparison
step_1.details: You may enter the product name (optional) and input the quantity of the product (if applicable).

step_2.title: Enter Volume/Weight and Price
step_2.details: Input the product’s weight or volume per unit (for weight/volume-based products) and enter the total price paid (required).

step_3.title: (Optional) Enter Shipping Cost
step_3.details: If there is a shipping fee, include it for more accurate calculations.

step_4.title: View Unit Price Calculation
step_4.details: The app calculates the unit price using the formula: (Price + Shipping Cost) / (Weight or Volume * Quantity).

step_5.title: Compare Multiple Items
step_5.details: Click 'Add Item' to input another product for comparison.

step_6.title: Reset Data
step_6.details: Click 'Reset' to clear all fields and start over.

instructions.note: You don’t need to fill in every field—just enter the relevant data for comparison!
